title: Miracle in Minnesota
creator_credit: Minnesota Theatre Co Foundation and Empire Photosound Inc
brief_description: Traces the development of the Tyrone Guthrie Theatre in Minneapolis, from construction to opening night. Shows the backstage functions of rehearsal, costume work and set building. Includes excepts from Hamlet, The Mixer, Three Sisters and Death of a Salesman.
